Name: Fire Story
About the game: A firefighter bursts into a burning building and finds a bunch of people there who were on fire, but bad luck, his fire extinguisher broke and escaped from his hands, now you need to use your own strength to direct the fire extinguisher to the fire in order to save everyone! FireStory - Top Down game about a firefighter, the player must fight off a flying fire extinguisher and direct the blow in such a way as to put out burning people and other sources of fire, any contact kills the player, and each hit on the fire extinguisher only speeds it up, and do not forget about the time, it is limited here ! Game Features: - High Difficulty. - Pixel Art. - Dynamic Music.
